creator: mozillamarcia.knous@gmail.com

comments.text:
This bug was filed from the Socorro interface and is
report bp-fea4ed41-817f-49de-beeb-adb210180423.
=============================================================

Seen while looking at nightly crash stats - Windows crashes started using Build 20180422223305: https://bit.ly/2vJmWgc. 26 crashes/5 installs so far

Possible regression range based on Build ID: https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/pushloghtml?fromchange=dd0e54d786743974a50a338059bcd68a09b6d5b2&tochange=378a8a64401f765bfd0706ff678a4f5db7c05385

Top 10 frames of crashing thread:

0  @0x340 
1 firefox.exe static bool sandbox::`anonymous namespace'::WarmupWindowsLocales security/sandbox/chromium/sandbox/win/src/target_services.cc:115
2 firefox.exe sandbox::TargetServicesBase::LowerToken security/sandbox/chromium/sandbox/win/src/target_services.cc:155
3 xul.dll mozilla::dom::ContentChild::RecvSetProcessSandbox dom/ipc/ContentChild.cpp:1743
4 xul.dll mozilla::dom::PContentChild::OnMessageReceived ipc/ipdl/PContentChild.cpp:5671
5 xul.dll mozilla::ipc::MessageChannel::DispatchAsyncMessage ipc/glue/MessageChannel.cpp:2139
6 xul.dll mozilla::ipc::MessageChannel::DispatchMessageW ipc/glue/MessageChannel.cpp:2069
7 xul.dll mozilla::ipc::MessageChannel::RunMessage ipc/glue/MessageChannel.cpp:1915
8 xul.dll mozilla::ipc::MessageChannel::MessageTask::Run ipc/glue/MessageChannel.cpp:1948
9 xul.dll nsThread::ProcessNextEvent xpcom/threads/nsThread.cpp:1096

=============================================================
